    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableFolders

        public ArrayList<FolderDetails> getAvailableFolders(String userId)
        Retrieves folders that have been "promoted" by an administrator to imply that they are to be made available to everyone on the site
        Parameters:
        userId - unique user identifier
        Returns:
        list of folders that are contained under the "Available" section

      • getPublicFolders

        public ArrayList<FolderDetails> getPublicFolders()
        Retrieves folders that are shared shared publicly. Note that this is different from featured folders that have a type of PUBLIC
        Returns:
        list of public folders on this site

      • getPublicEntries

        public FolderDetails getPublicEntries(ColumnField sort,
                             int offset,
                             int limit,
                             boolean asc)
        Retrieves entries that are made available publicly
        Parameters:
        sort - order of retrieval for the entries
        offset - start of retrieval
        limit - maximum number of entries to retrieve
        asc - whether to retrieve the entries in ascending order
        Returns:
        wrapper around the retrieved entries

      • getBulkUploadDrafts

        public ArrayList<FolderDetails> getBulkUploadDrafts(String userId)

      • getPendingBulkUploads

        public ArrayList<FolderDetails> getPendingBulkUploads(String userId)
        Retrieves information about submitted bulk uploads that have status "PENDING". Administrator only function
        Parameters:
        userId - unique identifier for user performing action. Must have admin privileges
        Returns:
        list of information about pending bulk uploads is user has administrative privileges, null otherwise

      • removeFolderContents

        public boolean removeFolderContents(String userId,
                           long folderId,
                           EntrySelection selection)

      • retrieveFolderContents

        public FolderDetails retrieveFolderContents(String userId,
                                   long folderId,
                                   ColumnField sort,
                                   boolean asc,
                                   int start,
                                   int limit)
        Retrieves the folder specified in the parameter and contents
        Parameters:
        userId - unique identifier for user making request. If null, folder must have public read privs
        folderId - unique identifier for folder to be retrieved
        sort - sort order for folder content retrieval
        asc - sort order for folder content retrieval; ascending if true
        start - index of first item in retrieval
        limit - upper limit count of items to be retrieval
        Returns:
        wrapper around list of folder entries if folder is found, null otherwise
        Throws:
        PermissionException - if user does not have read permissions on folder

      • getAndFilterFolderPermissions

        protected ArrayList<AccessPermission> getAndFilterFolderPermissions(String userId,
                                                        Folder folder)
        The permission(s) enabling the share for user is(are) included. If the user is an admin then all the permissions are included, otherwise only those pertaining to the user are included.

        e.g. if a folder F is shared with groups A and B and the user is a non-admin belonging to group B, folder F will be included in the list of folders returned but will only include permissions for group B

        Parameters:
        userId - identifier for user making request
        folder - Folder whose permissions are to be retrieved
        Returns:
        list of filtered permissions

      • update

        public FolderDetails update(String userId,
                   long folderId,
                   FolderDetails details)

      • delete

        public FolderDetails delete(String userId,
                   long folderId,
                   FolderType type)
        Deletes either a user folder or bulk upload (which is represented as a folder to the user)
        Parameters:
        userId - unique identifier for user requesting delete action
        folderId - unique identifier for folder to be deleted
        type - type of folder to be deleted (either "UPLOAD" or "PRIVATE")
        Returns:
        delete folder details

      • getSharedUserFolders

        public ArrayList<FolderDetails> getSharedUserFolders(String userId)
        Retrieves folders that have been shared with specified user as an individual or as part of a group.
        Parameters:
        userId - User whose shared folders are being retrieved
        Returns:
        list of folders meeting the shared criteria

      • getAccount

        protected Account getAccount(String userId)

      • promoteFolder

        protected FolderDetails promoteFolder(String userId,
                          Folder folder)
        "Promote"s a collection into a featured collection. This action is restricted to administrators. The owner does not have to be an administrator and maintains ownership after being featured
        Parameters:
        userId - requesting account id
        folder - folder to be promoted
        Returns:
        true if promotion is successful, false otherwise

      • demoteFolder

        protected FolderDetails demoteFolder(String userId,
                         Folder folder)
        Opposite of FolderController#demoteFolder(userId, long) Removes the folder from being a featured collections
        Parameters:
        userId - requesting account
        folder - to be demoted
        Returns:
        true on successful remote, false otherwise
